org.droidplanner.services.android.impl.core.gcs.roi

Class ROIEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.droidplanner.services.android.impl.core.gcs.roi.ROIEstimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location.LocationReceiver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FollowSoloShot.SoloROIEstimator

    public class ROIEstimator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Location.LocationReceiver
    Uses location data from Android's FusedLocation LocationManager at 1Hz and calculates new points at 10Hz based on Last Location and Last Velocity.
